You will play a key role in defining architecture for our Ethernet switching solutions for TSN and make sure that it all adds up to solutions with the right market attractiveness. 
Through your contribution you have the opportunity to influence on how coming key technologies globally will unfold and you will work with key players enabling this. 
We offer a versatile and challenging job opportunity in an international work environment.

h1091072.title: Production Engineer
h1091072.text:
Are you motivated by working with an extremely complex production, where you are responsible for the continuous operation of our production equipment, preventive maintenance, optimizations, and investment? 
Then you may well be the Production Engineer we are looking for at our Drug Substance factory, where you will have an important role in the fight to eradicate polio.
 As a Production Engineer, you will play a central role in both stabilizing and optimizing the production output. You will be responsible for equipment and systems in the API Viral Vaccines production facility. 
Together with your team, the operators and technicians in the production, your know-how and experience will be focused towards the stabilization of our equipment, technical management, maintenance and equipment improvements to ensure compliance with the planned production uptime.

h1091011.title: Experienced DevOps Engineer
h1091011.text:
AMC delivers game-changing cash management tools for large organizations, as well as for small private companies such as ourselves. Our daily bread is developing banking software to make life easier for financial departments around the world. 
 We need you if you can help us keep our internal systems running smoothly and contribute to finding smarter ways to develop our IT structure. 
 The relevant technologies and systems 
 AMC-Consult A/S offers work in an innovative and growing company, where each day brings new challenges and baffling tasks. The variety of work creates many new possibilities for both personal and professional development.

h1090974.title: Software Developer
h1090974.text:
Imagine a future - where internet connectivity knows no boundaries. Do you want to join one of the leading manufacturers of communication and satellite equipment on a fantastic transformational journey?
 We have an open position as a Software Developer within our software department for antennas and terminals. Here we bring life to the motor controlled satellite antennas and network connected terminals. 
 We think you currently work and have special interest in the following areas:

h1090928.title: Information Risk & Assurance Lead Specialist
h1090928.company: Vestas Wind Systems A/S, Aarhus or Copenhagen
h1090928.text:
Are you ready to step into the renewable industry and take on a central role as an Information Risk & Assurance Senior Specialist? You will become a part of a centrally placed department with the ambition to collaborate and support across Vestas to further lift the information security, risk & compliance discipline.
 As Senior Specialist responsible for risk and compliance, you will be improving and developing the IT risk methodology and supporting framework; assisting Global IT in mapping and maintaining its IT security controls based on known standards. 
 You will be a part of a highly dedicated and passionate organisation, driven equally by creating business value and by developing innovative technical solutions.

h1078774.title: 2 open positions as Hardware/Software engineer & Software engineer
h1078774.text:
Do you want to be part of a highly motivated, professional development team with hands on mentality and high-quality mindset? Do you want to use your professional skills to develop medical devices that help save lives? Do you see yourself as a person with great cross functional skills? 
Dameca A/S is looking for 2 experienced developers with personal drive, pioneer spirit and who at the same time wants to help "make a difference" in the development of safe and reliable anaesthesia machines for the world market. 
 You will be part of a small team of development engineers, that handles all disciplines required to develop medical devices.

h1068920.title: Frontend-udvikler
h1068920.text:
Vi søger en løsningsorienteret udvikler.
Hos SMARTPAGE hjælper vi danske virksomheder med deres digitalisering. Vores hovedfokus ligger på den online del, hvor vi bl.a. leverer e-handelsløsninger, som vi integrerer op mod kundernes andre systemer. Dertil tilbyder vi en lang række andre relevante services, som kan hjælpe vores kunder med deres online salg.
Med et stigende antal af spændende kunder og projekter, søger vi en skarp udvikler, der har mod på at arbejde med forretningskritiske løsninger.
Dit arbejde kommer primært til at omhandle udvikling af nye og eksisterende løsninger til understøttelse af kundernes forretning, implementering af design og UX, samt udvikling af både små og store features. Du vil bl.a. komme til at arbejde med med Razor, CSS frameworks og JavaScript frameworks (gerne React), samt forskellige API’er til integration af kundens andre systemer.

h1068567.title: Webudvikler
h1068567.text:
Vi søger en selvstændig og løsningsorienteret udvikler.
Hos SMARTPAGE hjælper vi danske virksomheder med deres digitalisering. Vores hovedfokus ligger på den online-del, hvor vi bl.a. leverer e-handelsløsninger, som vi integrerer op mod kundernes andre systemer. Dertil tilbyder vi en lang række andre relevante services, som kan hjælpe vores kunder med deres online-salg.
Med et stigende antal af spændende kunder og projekter, søger vi en skarp udvikler, der har mod på at arbejde med forretningskritiske løsninger.
Dit arbejde kommer primært til at omhandle udvikling af nye og eksisterende løsninger til understøttelse af kundernes forretning, implementering af design og UX, samt udvikling af både små og store features. Du vil bl.a. komme til at arbejde med med Razor, CSS frameworks og JavaScript frameworks. Du får mulighed for at lege med C#, .net og databaser og gøre brug af forskellige API’er til integration af kundens andre systemer.

h1090042.title: BI-konsulenter til dynamisk konsulenthus med høj faglighed
h1090042.company: Jobindex A/S søger for BIWise i København
h1090042.text:
Vil du hjælpe nogle af Danmarks største virksomheder med deres Business Intelligence-løsninger og fremme udviklingen af BI? Og kan du se dig selv i en rigtig god kultur med videndeling i fokus? 
Som konsulent hos BIWise vil du få ansvar for at skabe værdi hos vores kunder gennem bl.a. udvikling af eksisterende eller nye BI-løsninger, BI arkitektur og løsningsdesign, reviews og teknologivalg. 
Du vil komme til at bruge dine tekniske kompetencer, både når du udvikler løsninger og i dialogen med kunder, når du vurderer nye behov, eksisterende løsninger og teknologi, så kunderne får den løsning, der passer bedst til dem.
Du bliver derfor også et fagligt fyrtårn ude hos kunderne og en del af spændende kundeprojekter.

h1090298.title: Senior Developer with Passion for APIs
h1090298.text:
Are you an ambitious developer who has a big passion for building highly loaded public APIs? And do you at the same time love to design, implement and deploy features that reach 100.000 of our users everyday? Then look no further! There’s a pretty good chance that you’re the Senior Developer we’re looking for to come join our team. 
As a member of API team you would:

h1090242.title: Vi søger en dygtig softwareudvikler til et job med mening og muligheder
h1090242.text:
Du kommer til at indgå i et kompetent og højtuddannet team på fire, som brænder for det de laver. Der er god sparring, læring og godt humør. Du får indflydelse på dine arbejdsopgaver og hvordan de løses. Derudover har vi en god work-life balance med mulighed for hjemmearbejde.
Du kommer til at arbejde med opgaver, hvor du hurtigt kan se dit arbejde virke i praksis, og at din indsats gør en forskel for rigtig mange mennesker. 
Vi forventer et højt fagligt niveau inden for en eller begge af følgende:

h1090105.title: Lead Software Developer (Back End)
h1090105.text:
Joining Maersk T&L will embark you on a great journey with career development in a global organisation. As a Lead Software Developer you will gain broad business knowledge of the company’s activities globally, as well as understand how the com-plexity of IT supports the transport and logistics business. 
Key responsibilities

h1090026.title: Software Developer
h1090026.text:
Your role is to join one of our teams and help us be successful in making and consolidating our software tools. Your main qualification is your programming experience – the many times you have taken a problem and turned it into a solution through code. You have a master’s degree in a relevant field, and you have worked at least some 4 years as a programmer. 
 Besides being an active learner and experienced programmer in either Python or C#, you have worked with several of the following technologies:

h1089654.title: Fullstack senior .NET udvikler til Edora
h1089654.text:
Vil du være med helt fra start på et nyt greenfield softwareudviklingsprojekt, og har du interesse for udvikling, test, agile metoder og tværfagligt samarbejde, så er stillingen som fullstack senior .NET-udvikler måske noget for dig.
Vi søger en fullstack senior .NET udvikler, som skal være med til at udvikle et nyt greenfield softwareudviklingsprojekt sammen med vores dygtige team af udviklere, forretningsanalytikere og UX’er. Projektet er baseret på .Net, C#, Angular 9+, HTML, CSS/LESS, SQL, Entity Framework, Git og WCAG, og det vil være en fordel, hvis du er vant til at arbejde agilt og kender til SCRUM. 
Vi tilbyder en fast fuldtidsstilling med fleksible arbejdstider, selvstændighed i opgaveløsningen og gode udviklingsmuligheder, hvor du både vil få mulighed for at bidrage til de spændende projekter og lære en masse.

h1089407.title: Talent Acquisition Manager
h1089407.text:
As our Talent Acquisition Manager, your role will be focused on finding and recruiting new potential hires and use your talent to understand and match the specific needs for our growing organization. 
RESPONSIBILITIES

h1089923.title: Product Owner
h1089923.text:
To help shape the future of retail and self-service solutions. Are you a responsible, creative, motivated and ambitious Product Owner, and do you want to help shape the future of retail and self-service solutions?Then we have the job for you! 
 What we offer you: 
 Your main responsibilities will be to administer and convey retail-customer and end-user needs to your team and make sure all needs are met in the solutions that are produced. This means that your daily tasks will entail:

h1089892.title: Senior UI Designer til Berlingske Media
h1089892.text:
Som Senior UI designer hos Berlingske Media bliver du ansvarlig for at bringe brugervenlig design til virksomhedens stærke mediebrands - Berlingske.dk, BT.dk, Weekendavisen.dk og Euroinvestor.dk. 
Du kommer til at indgå i et lille passioneret team af UX designere og researchers, der varetager brugeroplevelsen for de millioner af brugere, som hver måned har deres gang på vores sites. Dine primære arbejdsopgaver vil være:

h1089756.title: Cloud Security Engineer
h1089756.text:
Our security team defends the products, data and systems that power Chainalysis. We are committed to building a diverse team of builders, breakers and shapers to address complex security problems in a novel, exciting space. 
Chainalysis Cloud Security Engineers are good problem solvers, automaters, and collaborative in nature. We measure success by how you are able to level up and increase the maturity of the Chainalysis cloud security footprint throughout the development lifecycle. 
In one year you’ll know you were successful if…

h1089692.title: Solution Architect
h1089692.text:
Trives du i brændpunktet mellem salg og teknisk rådgivning? Har du erfaring med salg af Cloud-løsninger, outsourcing og infrastruktur? Så kunne du måske blive vores næste Solution Architect!
 Hos Progressive har vi travlt og byder mange nye kunder velkommen. Vi har derfor brug for en Solution Architect, som kan tage være med til at sikre, at vores kunder udnytter fordelene ved digital transformation.
 Er det dig, der bliver Progressives nye Solution Architect kan du glæde dig til at blive en del af en dynamisk, ambitiøs og flad organisation, der lægger vægt på høj faglighed, engagement og kvalitet hele vejen rundt. Vi arbejder hen imod at blive førende på moderne Cloud services i Danmark og her kan du komme ind i billedet!

h1089614.title: Senior OT Security Engineer
h1089614.company: Ørsted, Gentofte, Skærbæk, Boston, Providence, Warsaw
h1089614.text:
Imagine a future where you’ll help to ensure safe and secure power production from our offshore wind farms.
 Join us in this role where you’ll be working on our US projects, ensuring that they’re built and adhere to the requirements imposed by the NERC CIP. A large part of this concerns compliance with ISO 27001, combined with our internal requirement for building assets based on IEC 62443. The combination of the two standards will ensure a high level of cybersecurity for the assets. 
 You’ll play an important role in:

h1089581.title: Ambitiøs JAVA-udvikler med lyst til at arbejde med markedsledende systemer
h1089581.company: GML-HR A/S søger for Lemvigh-Müller A/S i Herlev
h1089581.text:
Lemvigh-Müller søger en skarp, top of the line JAVA-udvikler med e-commerce erfaring til markedsledende udviklerteam i Herlev. 
Du bliver en central del af en stor og professionel IT organisation på over 50 dedikerede medarbejdere. Din rolle bliver at hjælpe med implementering af en ny commerce platform, da Lemvigh-Müller overgår fra .NET baseret commerce platform til en Java-baseret SAP Commerce Cloud platform. 
Der er meget få i Danmark, der har den nødvendige erfaring med den komplekse backend i SAP CC. Det betyder, at stillingen bliver et kæmpe aktiv og et meget attraktivt punkt på dit CV.

h1089533.title: Systemudvikler med bred erfaring i integrationer til ERP-systemer
h1089533.text:
Hvis du har mod på at være den, der bygger broer imellem ERP-systemer og omkringliggende applikationer, så er du den person, vi står og mangler. 
Vi vil opfattes af vores kunder som totalleverandør og en visionær og værdiskabende samarbejdspartner inden for IT-relaterede forretningsløsninger. Det betyder også, at vi hver især engagerer os aktivt i udvikling og effektivisering af vores kunders forretning og processer. 
Din primære opgave bliver at skabe disse integrationer til Visma.NET men også at vedligeholde og fortsat udvikle de +60 forskellige integrationer og programmer vi i dag har til Visma Business.

h1089359.title: Performance and Automation Test Engineer for Road IT Europe
h1089359.text:
This is an exciting opportunity if you are a software engineer with a knack for testing and a passion for efficient and elegant problem solving through automation. 
 In this role you can utilize your test automation skills to influence and help the quality of DSV's Road IT Europe division by being responsible for the technical definition and delivery of automated tests for validating both functional and non-functional requirements. 
 This role therefore requires a thorough understanding of both modern application architecture patterns, coupled with solid programming skills, and an excellent ability to design and automate test cases according to business requirements and the overall test strategy.

h1088158.title: Senior Architect med styr på Java og C#
h1088158.text:
Har du nogle års erfaring med udvikleropgaver, og har du lyst til at prøve kræfter med at arbejde på samfundskritiske løsninger? Kan du overskue hele løsninger – fra CI og udviklings-frameworks til integrationsdesign, performance og systemarkitektur – og sætter du en ære i at finde gode tekniske løsninger til komplekse problemstillinger? Så er du måske vores nye kollega til rollen som Senior Architect i Netcompany.
 Som Senior Architect har du ansvaret for, at forretningens krav bliver omsat til den rigtige tekniske løsning; baseret på de mest velegnede systemer, frameworks og valg af arkitektur. Det betyder, at du skal have en forståelse for mange forskellige systemer og aktivt følge den tekniske udvikling for at kunne matche kravspecifikationen bedst muligt. Man er derfor som Senior Architect ofte en del af den tidlige projektfase, der vedrører analyse og design.

h1089218.title: Erfarne frontend-udviklere søges til branchens mest ambitiøse UI-team (netcompany.com)
h1089218.text:
Du kommer til at være med til at udvikle samfundskritiske IT-systemer, der ikke bare har en betydning for vores kunder i det offentlige eller i pensions-, forsikrings- eller a-kassebrancherne, men for mennesker på tværs af det danske samfund. 
I jobbet som frontend-udvikler vil du blandt andet komme til at:

h1089214.title: Virtualization Specialist
h1089214.text:
Do you have an automation mindset? And are you specialised in virtualization technologies?
“At DSV, you truly get to unfold and develop your skills within virtualization as the infrastructure you help create supports a business which has a socially critical role on a global scale. The size of our IT solutions is hard to find elsewhere,” explains Manager, Virtualization & Storage, Carsten Heyde.
This means that you will:
... and much more.
Curious? Learn more  here.

h1089210.title: Storage Specialist
h1089210.text:
Do you have an automation mindset? And are you specialised in storage infrastructure and applications?
“At DSV, you truly get to unfold and develop your skills within storage as the infrastructure you help create and administer supports a business which has a socially critical role on a global scale. The size of our IT solutions is hard to find elsewhere,” explains Manager, Virtualization & Storage, Carsten Heyde.
This means that you will:
... and much more.
Curious? Learn more  here.

h1089017.title: Ambitiøs application supporter søges til IT-support-team
h1089017.company: Capax Recruitment, søger for Bolind A/S i Søborg
h1089017.text:
Som vores nye application supporter vil du komme til at arbejde i et spændende opgavefelt, hvor du dagligt leverer support til slutbrugere i høj kvalitet samtidig med, at du løbende arbejder med udviklingstiltag, som skal forbedre og optimere systemer og processer til gavn for brugere og forretningen. 
Med din position får du mulighed for at sikre sammenhæng mellem initiativer og strategi og anvende IT som et strategisk redskab i optimeringen og effektiveringen af arbejdsgange. 
Udover at få muligheden for at arbejde med en bred pallette af IT-opgaver i en stilling, som du kan være med til at præge, så vil du få masser af muligheder for at udvikle dig i en kompetent organisation med mange dygtige kolleger og være med til at løfte virksomheden til næste niveau inden for IT.

h1088883.title: System, Application and BI Lead
h1088883.company: ROCKWOOL International A/S, Hedehusene or Poznan
h1088883.text:
As our BI Lead, you will get a highly independent job, strongly supported by the team and key persons in the digital organization. You will be driving tangible benefits from digitalization of our Business Insights and driving a real change in the way we produce, present and analyse data. You will demonstrate new system capabilities, enable new insights and help accelerating move towards self-service and predictive analysis. 
 We expect you to have a natural authority and to utilize your strong experience and skills in stakeholder management and project management to secure a visible change management.

h1088854.title: Naval Architect/Engineer
h1088854.text:
Passionate about shipping and data? Being in the center of the clients, providing recommendations, acting as an expert and at the same time crunch numbers and make models? Come join our journeyand help reduce CO2 emissions? At ZeroNorth, we build software that turns complex data into actionable insights. We were founded by MaerskTankers to change the shipping industry through digitalization. We strive to help our customers optimize their business while reducing CO2 emissions. This is what empowers us. We use algorithms and data modeling to rapidly digitalize the shipping industry. 
 You will

h1088704.title: Team Lead - Software QA
h1088704.text:
3Shape is a global technology company headquartered in Copenhagen which offers unique career opportunities in the fields of Engineering, Software, and Regulatory & QA. 
We are now building a new team in our R&D organisation around the disciplines of Quality Assurance for Software, Medical Device process governance (ISO 13485 + more), and Information Security Management (ISO 27001). 
The team’s responsibilities are: 
Your responsibilities are furthermore to manage this small team to nurture the team’s mission.

h1088395.title: IT-Udviklingschef — spændende transformationsproces
h1088395.company: Hansen Toft A/S søger for YX Danmark A/S i Søborg
h1088395.text:
Er du IT-leder, IT-projektleder eller lignende, og ønsker du at gå forrest i en transformation og drive et kompetent udviklingsteam på 5 medarbejdere? Så er dette job i en unik og agil kultur sikkert noget for dig. 
 YX Danmark har stort fokus på at skabe den bedste kundeoplevelse og vil i markedet været kendt for netop dette. Det kræver effektive og brugervenlige systemer, som kan levere grundlaget til forretningen. YX Danmark er midt i en IT-transformation med strategisk betydning for fremtiden, hvor virksomheden gradvist transformerer sig fra et eget udviklet RPG-system (IBM i platform) til en Java-platform.
Virksomheden søger derfor nu en hands-on IT-Udviklingschef, som får til hovedopgave dels at sikre, at transformationen kommer i mål samt dels, at teamet på fem kompetente udviklere får faglig sparring og løbende motiveres.

h1084661.title: Enterprise Systemspecialist – GIS og Location Intelligence-løsninger
h1084661.company: People Company søger for Geoinfo A/S i Aalborg, Glostrup eller Kolding
h1084661.text:
People Company søger for Geoinfo A/S en udadvendt, erfaren og kundeorienteret Enterprise Systemspecialist til landets førende software-distributør og konsulentvirksomhed indenfor geografiske informationssystemer (GIS). 
Det handler om drift, support, systemarkitektur, forskellige projekt- og konsulentopgaver ude hos kunder og internt – og det handler om at arbejde med at transformere geografiske data af enhver slags til værdi.
Du vil blive en del af System- og Driftsgruppen i konsulentafdelingen med arbejdssted i Glostrup eller Kolding. En væsentlig arbejdsopgave bliver at deltage i leverancen af Geoinfos System- og Driftsservice, hvor kunder hjælpes med at drive og designe ArcGIS-platformen på kundens egen infrastruktur eller i eksempelvis Azure eller Amazon.

h1101165.title: HARDWARE ENGINEER
h1101165.company: Teknik Bureauet ApS recruiting on behalf of Weibel in Allerød
h1101165.text:
Would you like to design electromechanical solutions for Radar Systems? 
On behalf of Weibel, Teknik Bureauet is looking for a hardware engineer for their Trailer & Shelter team, which is responsible for designing the vehicle platforms for their radar systems. If you have experience within electronics and electro-mechanics and you want to work together with other talented engineers in a cross-functional team covering mechanical, digital and analog hardware, then we would like to hear from you. 
 At Weibel you will join a truly technology driven company which deliver solutions across the world. For many years, they have set the global standards for high quality tracking radars used by e.g. NASA and Lockheed Martin. Due to their ambitious strategy, they experience success in the market and high growth.

h1101003.title: PhD Project in Computer Vision for Estimating Microstructure Using Optical Models
h1101003.text:
Department of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science's (DTU Compute) section for Visual Computing, would like to invite applications for a 3-year PhD position starting 1 October 2021.
This position is part of a research project on real-time monitoring of continuous mozzarella production, where you will be part of a large research team. Your role will be to find methods for acquiring optical properties and for correlating these with microscopic and functional properties of the observed product. More specifically, you will work on methods for model-based estimation of microstructure from optical measurements. Results from your research will be used by another PhD student for correlating the microstructure to functional cheese properties.

h1100953.title: PhD Project in Deep Learning for Segmenting and Characterizing 3D Microstructure
h1100953.text:
Department of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science’s (DTU Compute) section for Visual Computing, would like to invite applications for a 3-year PhD position starting 1 October 2021. The project is financed by Innovation Fund Denmark. If you are interested in deep learning, 3D image analysis, computer vision, and experimental work, this PhD position could be exactly what you are looking for.
Your overall focus will be 3D image analysis for characterizing and modelling microstructure. To accomplish this, you will perform CT scans and create methods for segmenting fibrous structures in 3D µCT images and make appropriate data structures to represent the segmented objects.

h1100866.title: Feature team Developer
h1100866.text:
Would you like to work with some of the world’s most advanced technologies? Are you ready to join an agile team with a large degree of knowledge sharing? 
 Joining our team, you will face a great opportunity to work on a new platform to support our most modern and complex hearing instruments. In this challenging position, your tasks and responsibilities consist of developing and implementing high quality software. You will be involved in the whole process from requirement specifications, design and implementation to final test and documentation. 
Our software is a Windows desktop application created in C#/.NET. The software enables the hearing aid professionals to program the hearing instruments and present our advanced features in the most optimal way.

h1100860.title: Backend Software Developer C# for Oticon
h1100860.text:
Would you like to work with some of the world’s most advanced technologies? Are you ready to join an agile team with a large degree of knowledge sharing? And do you want to make the lives of millions of people worldwide better? Then you should apply for this great opportunity! 
 We are expanding our international Software Solutions department, located across Denmark and Poland. You will face a great opportunity to create a new platform to support our most modern and complex hearing aids. In this challenging position, your tasks and responsibilities consist of developing and implementing high quality software. You will be involved in the whole process from requirement specifications, design and implementation to final test and documentation. We deliver Cross platform applications based on Windows desktop and Xamarin created in C#/.NET.

h1100855.title: Signal processing or audio Engineer for system testing
h1100855.text:
Do you have a passion for testing complex integrated systems? Will you thrive working with a holistic system, where digital signal processing, audiology, electro-acoustic, software and hardware all must come together in an integrated solution to serve the end users? 
 As a System Test Engineer in this position, your daily work will be a part of a small development team (Scrum like) where the team both develops and tests DSP and audiological features for hearing aids. 
 Your main tasks in the development team will be:

h1100605.title: IT-systemarkitekt til udvikling af fremtidens digitaliserede forsvar
h1100605.text:
Er du en erfaren og nysgerrig it-systemarkitekt, og brænder du for at udvikle dit speciale og dygtiggøre dig indenfor dit fag? Og kan du løfte IT-infrastrukturen, og sikre konsolidering af Forsvarets it for soldater i ind- og udland? Så er det dig, vi leder efter!
Stillingen har ingen fast geografisk placering, da vi har lokationer i hele landet. Det er derfor op til dig, hvor dit tjenestested skal være. 
Stillingen indeholder en bred vifte af opgaver relateret til infrastruktur og netværksarkitektur, løsningsorienteret arkitektur samt kommunikativt og strategisk IT-arkitektur.

h1100356.title: Senior Medical Device Software Developer
h1100356.text:
In your new role, you will work with an international team of 15-20 developers, architects and specialists located across three sites (Denmark, France, and Poland). Joining us, you will play a very important role in improving and developing a software platform for supporting our most modern and highly complex hearing implants. We work with the most advanced technologies and development methodologies. 
 The software products you will be working with, are developed for our professional customers (hearing care professionals) who use it from initial surgery to the individual fine tuning of our hearing implants. It is a desktop application, but mobile apps and cloud-based solutions play a growing part of our deliveries. We continuously work to adapt and optimize our development methods and we are significantly influenced by agile development thinking.

h1100355.title: Embedded Software Developer with Bluetooth experience
h1100355.text:
Are you the best Embedded Software Bluetooth Developer in town, and are you looking for a truly meaningful career, where you can create advanced solutions that help millions of people worldwide? 
 In your new position, you will be part of a team of 16 people divided into self-managed SCRUM teams, who design and implement the embedded software for our in-house developed ASICs, which are used in our hearing instruments. 
 We promise you it will not be boring, and you can look forward to handling the following tasks:

h1073941.title: Software Developer
h1073941.text:
DAMM Cellular Systems A/S is a world leader in the provision of scalable, innovative, user-friendly and cost-efficient TETRA and DMR infrastructure products to industrial, commercial and public safety customers. 
We are looking for a software developer to join our R&D Software Development Team. 
You will be responsible for the following areas:

h1073934.title: Test/Hardware Software Developer
h1073934.text:
We are looking for an experienced test engineer to take us further in the field of development and maintenance of test fixtures for both hardware and software. 
The main task will be to develop tools and systems for testing in R&D and Production. Your job responsibilities will include:

h1073927.title: Radio Communication Developer
h1073927.text:
DAMM Cellular Systems A/S is a world leader in the provision of scalable, innovative, user-friendly and cost-efficient TETRA and DMR infrastructure products to industrial, commercial and public safety customers. 
We are looking for a development engineer with experience in design and development of RF circuits and units with special knowledge and experience of digital linearization technologies and whose primary task will be to develop part of our radio communication. 
As radio communication developer at DAMM your further responsibilities will include:

h1076252.title: IT-udvikler
h1076252.company: & friends søger for Letpension i Virum
h1076252.text:
Som IT-udvikler hos Letpension får du mulighed for at bruge din viden og erfaring samt bidrage til, at Letpension leverer deres nye versioner i den rigtige kvalitet til tiden. 
Hvis du er den, vi søger, har du allerede bevist, at du er nysgerrig og har gåpåmod. Du er i dag den person, dine udviklerkolleger naturligt går til, hvis de har behov for sparring og viden. 
Du er resultatorienteret og brænder for at gøre en forskel - en forskel, der kun kan opnås, hvis du har lyst og evner til at skabe resultater sammen med andre. 
I Letpension arbejder de agilt, hvilket betyder, at IT og forretningsudvikling foregår i en tæt dialog. Du skal derfor trives i krydsfeltet mellem forretning og IT. De arbejder med Scrum i kvartalscyklusser, hvor alle bidrager på lige fod i forhold til de opgaver, der løbende prioriteres højest, og som udvikles i værktøjer primært fra et Microsoft-univers.

h1100059.title: Data Warehouse Engineer til Business Science & AI
h1100059.text:
Vil du arbejde med landets mest spændende datagrundlag? Har du styr på SQL? Og er du optaget at forstå dine kunders behov? Så er du den erfarne Data Warehouse Engineer, vi drømmer om. 
 I Business Science & AI er vi på udkig efter en kollega til vores team bestående af 10 dataspecialister, der er ansvarlige for BI-løsninger i ATP’s Udbetaling Danmark. Vi arbejder BI Fullstack med alt fra at trække data fra kildesystemer til at udstille data i Power BI. Når du starter hos os, får du en hverdag, hvor det er vores Data Warehouse, SQL og interessen for vores kunders problemstillinger, der er omdrejningspunktet. 
Konkret kommer du bl.a. til at:

h1099670.title: Senior Data Scientist
h1099670.company: Maersk Drilling A/S, Lyngby, Denmark or Gdansk, Poland
h1099670.text:
Would you like to participate in the journey to reshape offshore drilling through data science? Are you interested in engaging with internal and external customers and addressing different kinds of business challenges via data solutions that you develop? Then you may be our new Senior Data Scientist! 
 As Senior Data Scientist you will be part of the Maersk Drilling Advanced Analytics team, together with the other team members you will be responsible for…

h1092010.title: Webudvikling og kvalitetssikring – C#, .NET, JavaScript, CSS
h1092010.company: Jobindex A/S søger for D4 Enterprise Solutions ApS i Hillerød
h1092010.text:
Du får ansvar for at udføre kvalitetskontrol og softwaretest, i form af sikkerhedsgennemgang af vores eksisterende software samt sikkerhedsgennemgang og kvalitetskontrol af kildekode. 
 Det er dig, der sikrer, at der ikke er fejl eller huller i vores kode. Du står derfor i spidsen for, at vi opnår et endnu højere sikkerhedsniveau.

h1099485.title: Product Owner
h1099485.text:
Make your impact and be a part of shaping the future for SameSystem; a Danish Software-as-a-Service company. 
As a Product Owner you work strategically, tactically, and operationally. This means that you will be involved in the entire production chain – from the initial idea, where you co-create with customers, to the final execution. 
Your responsibilities will be, among other things:

h1099364.title: Proactive and pragmatic Product Owner, SME channels, Corporate Channels (Lyngby, Greater Copenhagen)
h1099364.text:
Do you want to lead the building of the new digital corporate offering for SMEs to improve our customer facing channels? We now offer a unique opportunity to be part of Corporate Channels Tribe within Danske Bank, where we build and own the digital desktop and mobile channels for all corporate customers in Danske Bank. 
We are offering a position as Product Owner for the desktop solution for SMEs – i.e. a simplified version of the current Prospera winning District platform that we have available to our mid-and large corporate segments.

h1099248.title: Senior Software Developer - Platform work
h1099248.text:
We are currently looking for a experienced software developer to maintain a software platform, which supports a lot of HBK’s applications within acoustics and vibration.
 HBK develops measurement systems with inputs from a broad range of sensor and signal types within domains as sound & vibration, durability & fatigue, and e-drive – all domains that require high channel counts and/or high-speed data acquisition. 
 Our customers are typically manufacturers within the automotive, aerospace, white goods or telecom industries and our measurement systems are often used within the customer’s R&D or test departments for evaluation of designs with respect to performance and quality. 
The primary responsibility is to maintain the software platform, keeping the quality at a high level.

h1098607.title: Software Engineer for debt collection area
h1098607.company: Danske Bank, Kgs. Lyngby or Glostrup
h1098607.text:
Are you a curious and passionate software engineer who aims to be challenged, and help the growth of a team of competent engineers? Are you passionate about delivering good solutions, and could you see yourself using your knowledge improving Danske Banks customer solutions for the debt collection area. 
Task in this squad will include:

h1098117.title: CRM Developer – join a team where collaboration is in focus
h1098117.text:
Becoming part of this team is a great opportunity to work in an agile setup, as part of an empowered and cross-functional team. Our two CRM Squads are international (10 nationalities and counting!) and English is the primary language. 
As a CRM Developer your mission will be to:

h1085492.title: .NET-udvikler til spændende stilling i en højteknologisk dansk virksomhed
h1085492.text:
#Chat-speak robots, sales & marketing software, houseowners social digital platform (myhouse.dk), digital climate plan, software for tender management, GDPR processes, Dynamic pricing - is what we do.
Vil du arbejde selvstændigt og programmere avanceret software, videreudvikle et forvaltningssystem til fortsat digital integration, i direkte dialog og sparring med kunden? 
Bliv en del af en specialiseret software-organisation med engagerede og fagligt kompetente specialister i Product-teamet. Ansvarlig for udvikling af softwaren til kundens kerneprodukt baseret på agile processer og i dialogen med produktejere, teamlederen og erfarne kollegaer. 
Arbejd med ny- og videreudvikling af web-services, utility-programmer og komponenter, hvor værktøjerne er Typescript, JavaScript, html, C# og .NET samt fremtidige standardløsninger baseret på fx Azure, Containerteknologier og .NET 5.

h1097877.title: UX Designer for Hearing Implants
h1097877.text:
If you are one of the best UX designers out there, we would like to invite you to join us on our exciting mission and help us create an even stronger digital marketing presence that supports our commercial strategy, leverages our communication towards patients and professionals and supports our local sales companies in achieving their goals. 
 Your key tasks will be to define the overall user experience for our digital sales and service platform to candidates, users and professional customers.

h1097060.title: Embedded Software Engineer
h1097060.text:
Interesserer du dig for samspillet mellem elektronik og software, og vil du arbejde sammen med andre ingeniører, der gerne vil udfordres af dine gode ideer? Så kan du blive en del af et team af specialister i Weibel.
Vi søger en eller flere softwareingeniører til at udvikle vores nye overvågningsradar til detektion af droner og videreudvikling af vores tracking-radarer. Lige nu søger vi inden for følgende områder: 
Da du får stort selvstændigt ansvar, er det vigtigt, at du har overblik og er god til at holde fremdrift i dine opgaver, så du leverer som aftalt.

h1096941.title: Technical Solutions Manager (TSM) – Scandinavia
h1096941.text:
At Fleet Complete we are invested in your success. We want you to have a job you are genuinely excited about, as well as opportunities to learn, grow and challenge yourself. If you are passionate about your career and are eager to be a key contributor to the company’s success, then this role is for you. 
 Essential duties & responsibilities: 
 The position is focused on supporting the Scandinavian team; the ideal candidate will be situated in Scandinavia, however strong applicants with previous telematics experience will be considered in regions outside of the preferred location.

h1096645.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer (.NET)
h1096645.text:
Do you want to join Danske Bank on our journey to develop cool and innovative value-added features for the Danske Bank Mobile Bank app that is widely used by private customers across many countries? Then check this out and apply sooner rather than later! 
We imagine that you are a full-stack software engineer. In addition to your passion and skills within cloud development you also have interest in front-end, design discussions, and mentoring. You take pride in delivering well-designed, optimized and scalable solutions. You contribute to team discussions and dialog, are a team player, and you are committed to and accountable for squad deliveries and end results.

h1096592.title: Senior User Experience Designer (Copenhagen Region)
h1096592.text:
Greetings from the Welcoming & Orchestration Tribe! We are responsible for creating an amazing welcoming experience for new private and business customers across channels – an experience that feels easy, fast & transparent. The work you will be doing will have a large impact on users and Danske Bank. Are you ready for that challenge? 
In our tribe we welcome customers and provide product orchestration services to customer journey tribes. Our vision is to transform the way we welcome customers and revolutionize how we do product ordering – contributing to the further digitalization of Danske Bank.

h1096476.title: Test Engineers til ATP’s IT-organisation
h1096476.text:
Er du nyuddannet inden for software eller tilsvarende? Vil du teste nogle af landet vigtigste digitale systemer? Så er du måske en af de kolleger, vi søger. Kan du kvalitetssikre løsninger fra start til slut? 
I ATP’s IT-organisation er vi på udkig efter nye kolleger til rollen som tester. Kolleger, der tænker test ind fra starten og sikrer høj kvalitet.
 Du får:

h1096192.title: Senior Software Engineer (.Net)
h1096192.company: Danske Bank, Kgs. Lyngby or Glostrup
h1096192.text:
Do you want to join Danske Bank on our journey to improve the credit decision processes? We are committed to be at the forefront of digital development in our pursuit to create the bank of the future. To do this we need bright minds and highly motivated individuals with pioneer spirit and the courage to challenge the way we do things. 
Your day-to-day work will be in a cross-functional Squad. In the Squad you’ll be working with creating a modern new system and integrating with the existing bank systems. You'll have a say in architectural considerations, as well as contributing to the system design, and, of course, development. As a Senior Software Engineer you are mentoring and a front runner in new practices and tools.

h1095733.title: Automation Engineer
h1095733.text:
Would you like to participate in groundbreaking research and make an impact on Life Science, then join the Cloud Development Team at DTU - Computerome! 
The Danish National Life Science Supercomputing Center, Computerome is a High-Performance Computing (HPC) facility specialized for Life Science. Users include research groups from all Danish universities and large international research consortiums as well, as users from industry and the public health care sector. 
They all benefit from the fast, flexible and secure infrastructure, and the ability to combine different types of sensitive data for computational analysis. Computerome is physically installed at the DTU Risø campus and managed by a strong team of specialists working at DTU Lyngby.

h1095727.title: Head of BI / BI Manager til danskernes foretrukne husbygger-firma
h1095727.text:
HusCompagniet etablerede i 2019 en central Business Intelligence funktion med det formål at blive en mere datadrevet virksomhed. BI bruges flittigt af ledelsen, og i denne rolle skal man forvente en tæt dialog med direktionen og den øverste ledelse, som har meget fokus på data og yderligere professionalisering af virksomheden. 
Du bliver leder af vores BI afdeling, der lige nu arbejder end-to-end fra kildedata i vores backend-systemer og hele vejen til den færdige rapport og dashboard. Du kommer til at rapportere til Head of Strategy & Business Development og vil have din daglige gang på vores kontor i Virum med eventuelle møder på vores andre kontorer i Danmark. Til at udføre de mere tekniske opgaver har vi ansat en data engineer, som du blive leder for. 
Dine vigtigste opgaver vil være at omdanne forretningsbehov til nye løsninger samt sikre driften af den nuværende løsning.

h1095555.title: Commercial Business Analyst til dansk multibrand designhus
h1095555.text:
Vil du være med til en succesfuld transformation af Rosendahl Design Group, der bl.a. indeholder overskrifter som; digitalisering, innovation, markeds- og kanalstrategier, E-com, internationalisering og effektivisering? 
 Som Commercial Business Analyst hos Rosendahl Design Group bliver du en del af et kreativt hus, der arbejder med dansk design og efterspurgte designskatte i både Danmark og internationalt. Du vil referere til vores CFO og får et tæt samarbejde med den øvrige ledergruppe og den kommercielle del af organisationen. 
 Du bliver en central spiller i at levere indsigt og datagrundlag til udvikling og eksekvering af vores strategiske prioriteter. Du vil også deltage i gennemførelse af udvalgte strategiske projekter i samarbejde med øverste ledelse og i tæt dialog med primære beslutningstagere.

h1095552.title: Senior RPA Developer
h1095552.text:
We are seeking two talented Senior RPA developers to drive our digital transformation journey and engage with internal and external clients to uncover, define and solve complex challenges.
As a Senior RPA developer you will be part of the Maersk Drilling, Automation Program and together with the other team members you will be responsible for implementing and delivering new automations and software robots and assuming control of operational application management to ensure the RPA platform is fully functional, updated and available at all times.

h1085293.title: QA IT Specialist: Impact the quality standards within IT GXP systems
h1085293.text:
Do you have experience with qualification and validation of IT systems data generating processes? Would you like to provide QA support within a broad portfolio of IT GxP system projects? Are you a team player and motivated by professional challenges and development opportunities? Then you might be the QA IT Specialist we are looking for! 
 In QA we are approximately 40 dedicates employees working in 4 different QA departments and a group of QPs. You will be a part of the QA Support team that currently consist of 9 employees. The team provides QA support to the Clinical, QC, Regulatory, Manufacturing and other line-of-business areas. We support validation/qualification activities of manufacturing equipments and GxP IT systems.

h1071986.title: IT-medarbejder
h1071986.text:
Du vil indgå i vores nordiske team for vikarydelser, med direkte reference til vores IT-medarbejder. 
Vi er kendetegnet ved at være en entreprenant og resultatorienteret organisation med højt til loftet. Du skal bidrage til fortsat vækst ved at være ambitiøs, målrettet og resultatorienteret. Dette er et drømmejob for dig, der kan lide at skabe, udvikle og se resultater af egne præstationer. 
Du motiveres af at have mange bolde i luften, og du formår at holde fokus. Du har mod på at tillære nye kompetencer, og du er nysgerrig på nyeste digitale teknologier og trends. Du besidder en naturlig nysgerrighed og har en passion for alle aspekter af softwareudviklingen.

h1094036.title: Underviser
h1094036.company: New Nordic Youth - Efterskolen for iværksætteri S/I, Hundested
h1094036.text:
Tech & programmering — studiebolig & madordning
- et cool job med undervisning af tech elever — og efterskoleliv 
Om undervisningen:

h1094388.title: Senior Front-end Developer
h1094388.text:
Join an established team that is pushing the boundaries of banking. With the heart of a start-up and the backbone of a solid organisation, our team is developing District, a platform that has a substantial impact on the business banking in the Nordics. 
We are looking for front-end developers with different levels of experience. Whether you have graduated recently or worked for years in a software development environment, we expect that you are ready to join a team of dedicated team players. We value diversity and inclusion, collaborators over cowboys, creativity over closed-mindedness and sustainability over fire-fighting.

h1094354.title: IT-projektleder
h1094354.company: Randstad A/S søger for IT Relation
h1094354.text:
Til en nyoprettet stilling hos IT Relation søges en IT-projektleder, som vil få ansvaret for at holde styr på de spændende projekter, der lander i afdelingen. I Microsoft Solutions er vi specialiseret i Office 365-løsninger, herunder BI, CRM, SharePoint, Teams osv. Løsninger, der alle understøtter og effektiviserer kundernes forskellige processer. 
 Du vil som projektleder få ansvaret for at drive og styre både store og mindre projekter, og du kommer til at spille en meget central rolle ift. at sikre, at der leveres den værdi, kunden ønsker – til tiden. Sammen med projektteamet skal du sørge for, at I kommer godt fra start og sikkert i mål på en effektiv måde med de leverancer, der er lovet.

h1094351.title: Modern workplace employer experience office 365 konsulent
h1094351.company: Randstad A/S søger for IT Relation
h1094351.text:
Til en nyoprettet stilling hos IT Relation søges en Modern Workplace/Employer Experience (O365) konsulent, som vil blive udførende på diverse Office 365-projekter – helt fra workshops med kunderne til opsætning af løsningen til den afsluttende overdragelse. Det er derfor væsentligt, at du har en rigtig god forretningsforståelse og kan sparre med kunderne omkring optimering af deres forskellige processer, således at vores løsninger skaber den rette værdi for kunden. 
 Du vil have en hverdag præget af en tæt dialog med både kunder og kolleger i forhold til at levere værdi til kunden, sikre intern sparring og en fornuftig fordeling af opgaver. Opgaverne spænder fra deltagelse i salg til gennemførelse af projekter hos kunden. Du bliver en succes i jobbet, hvis du har en agil tilgang til projekter og kan sætte dig ind i kundernes forretningsprocesser.

h1094196.title: Chapter lead for Data Warehouse udviklere
h1094196.text:
Som Chapter Lead driver du den faglige udvikling af tribens Data Warehouse udviklere med fokus på technical mastery og personaleledelse. Målsætningen er, at alle medarbejdere bevidst arbejder på at dygtiggøre sig inden for sit kompetencefelt. 
 Samtidig med ledelsesrollen er du udførende data warehouse udvikler/data scientist i et Squad. 
 Du agerer ”spillende træner”, og er it-udvikler i et squad, hvor du som faglig spydspids får en vigtig rolle i udvikling af løsninger på Data Warehouse området i samarbejde med dit squad. Squadet har primært et back-end udviklingsansvar, hvor vi i dag anvender SAS på Oracle og MS SQL. Vi er som udviklingsorganisation i gang med at opbygge et solidt Data Warehouse fundament, der kan understøtte bankens mange rapporteringsbehov.

h1094163.title: Azure Cloud Engineer
h1094163.text:
As one of our experienced Azure Cloud Engineers you will help build WS Audiology’s next generation cloud-based hearing aid software - used by Hearing Care Professionals to help serve their patient's needs.
 We are currently establishing a new Cloud Infrastructure & Security team, consisting of skilled backend & DevOps engineers. The team – that is part of a SAFE train – is responsible for building a modern large scale cloud environment that enables WS Audiology to release software in an efficient, secure & reliable manner. The team is based in Lynge, Denmark. 
You will primarily:

h1093981.title: Nyuddannet eller erfaren udvikler/data scientist til nyt udviklingssquad
h1093981.company: Jyske Bank, Silkeborg eller Kgs. Lyngby
h1093981.text:
Vær med til at gøre arbejdet med data nemt og let tilgængeligt for vores brugere 
 Du bliver en del af et nystartet udviklingssquad, der får ansvaret for det datagrundlag, som understøtter Jyske Banks risiko og kreditmodeller. Målet er at styrke hele området omkring risiko og kreditmodeller til at være mere datadrevne.
 Dine primære arbejdsopgaver er blandt andet, at:

h1082245.title: Principal Biostatistician
h1082245.text:
Would you like to have a key role in the clinical development in ALK and have the opportunity to influence the strategy on how to achieve the organizational goals of ALK? 
 As a Principal Biostatistician, you will be a part of the Biometrics Department including Biostatistics, Clinical Data Management and Statistical Programming with 14 employees. Biometrics contributes to the entire drug development process from discovery to market. We are responsible for all clinical data deliverables for clinical trials, marketing authorization of new drugs as well as variation applications, support to marketing and publications.
 Field of responsibility

h1093392.title: PenSam Bank søger forretningsudvikler med erfaring fra pengeinstitutbranchen og flair for Data management
h1093392.text:
Vi søger en ny kollega med interesse for forretningsudvikling og brugen af data, og som ønsker at være en del af en bank, hvor beslutningsgangene er korte, og mulighederne for indflydelse er stor. 
 Som forretningsudvikler skal du via intern og ekstern dialog medvirke til at skabe grundlaget for kvalitet og udvikling af PenSam Bank. Du skal derfor trives i krydsfeltet mellem forretning og IT og være vant til at begå dig i et fagligt miljø, der spænder bredt. 
 Dine primære arbejdsopgaver:

h1093317.title: Head of Software Engineering
h1093317.text:
Are you passionate about developing software solutions and would you like to play a managerial part in driving the digitalization journey of an international company? Then you may be our new Head of Software Engineering.
You will be overall responsible for delivering bespoke software solutions to Maersk Drilling in alignment with the company’s strategic goals and plans.

h1092924.title: Monitoring Specialist
h1092924.text:
Kan du tage ansvar for overvågningen af vores vigtigste aktiv, den præcise og gnidningsfri deling af information mellem vores samarbejdspartnere? Kan du reagere rettidigt og rigtigt, når noget glipper? Vil du have mulighed for masser af hands-on erfaring og personlig udvikling i en moderne og innovativ virksomhed? Så læs videre. 
Du bliver en del af vores Technical Operations-team. Det er jer, der sikrer kernedriften af vores datacentre, som monitorerer dataflow mellem vores samarbejdspartnere 24/7.
Som monitoring specialist tager du ejerskab på overvågningen. Du er den første, der ser de røde lamper blinke, hvis kommunikationsflowet glipper, og du er den, der sørger for, at problemet bliver løst.

h1092990.title: Software Architect - DevOps
h1092990.text:
We are expanding our international team of 250+ employees in our Software Solutions group, located across Denmark and Poland. This position is in our Release and Deployment team that handle a lot of diverse tasks in relation to our shared infrastructure, build and continuous delivery environment.
 Oticon offers you a challenging position as Software Architect in the DevOps area. In this newly created position, we are looking for a skilled colleague that, together with the team and the PO, can define and plan the direction of our build and deployment infrastructure so it continues to enable faster software delivery while maintaining a high quality.

h1092774.title: Applikationsarkitekt med fokus på Front-end
h1092774.company: Convision A/S søger for QualiWare i Farum
h1092774.text:
QualiWare blev grundlagt i 1991 og er en global spiller på det globale marked inden for forretningsmodelleringssoftware. Målet er at levere produkter og tjenester, der hjælper virksomhedens kunder med at få succes i et dynamisk markedsmiljø med initiativer inden for Enterprise Architecture, Quality Management, Business Process Management og Optimering. 
For at forblive konkurrencedygtige skal virksomheder reagere hurtigt på markedsdynamikken, og QualiWare’s produkter og service tilbyder en innovativ tilgang til markedsdynamik og forandring. 
 Som Applikationsarkitekt (placeret i det danske team) på Front-end siden skal du være udviklingsafdelingens specialist, der både kan sparre med og udvikle teamet.

h1092771.title: Test Manager med evnen til at videreudvikle testområdet
h1092771.company: Convision A/S søger for QualiWare i Farum
h1092771.text:
QualiWare blev grundlagt i 1991 og er en global spiller på det globale marked inden for forretningsmodelleringssoftware. Målet er at levere produkter og tjenester, der hjælper virksomhedens kunder med at få succes i et dynamisk markedsmiljø med initiativer inden for Enterprise Architecture, Quality Management, Business Process Management og Optimering. 
For at forblive konkurrencedygtige skal virksomheder reagere hurtigt på markedsdynamikken, og QualiWare’s produkter og service tilbyder en innovativ tilgang til markedsdynamik og forandring. 
Som Test Manager (placeret i det danske team) i udviklingsafdelingen er der behov for øget planlægning og prioritering, herunder testplaner, definering af testcases og udførelse af test. QualiWare udfører p.t. manuelle test, men du har gennem din erfaring, mulighed for at påvirke fremtidens teststrategi.

h1092767.title: Enterprisearkitekt med forretningsforståelse
h1092767.company: Convision A/S søger for QualiWare i Farum
h1092767.text:
QualiWare blev grundlagt i 1991 og er en global spiller på det globale marked inden for forretningsmodelleringssoftware. Målet er at levere produkter og tjenester, der hjælper virksomhedens kunder med at få succes i et dynamisk markedsmiljø med initiativer inden for Enterprise Architecture, Quality Management, Business Process Management og Optimering. 
For at forblive konkurrencedygtige skal virksomheder reagere hurtigt på markedsdynamikken, og QualiWare’s produkter og service tilbyder en innovativ tilgang til markedsdynamik og forandring. 
Som enterprisearkitekt i kundesucces afdelingen har du mulighed for at bruge din store viden inden for leverance af professionelle løsninger fra QualiWare. Du vil være QualiWare's produkt ekspert overfor kunder hele vejen fra salg, til leverance og uddannelse (sparring i både salg, demo og kursus).

h1092761.title: Løsningsarkitekt med sans for "Service Delivery"
h1092761.company: Convision A/S søger for QualiWare i Farum
h1092761.text:
QualiWare blev grundlagt i 1991 og er en global spiller på det globale marked inden for forretningsmodelleringssoftware. Målet er at levere produkter og tjenester, der hjælper virksomhedens kunder med at få succes i et dynamisk markedsmiljø med initiativer inden for Enterprise Architecture, Quality Management, Business Process Management og Optimering. 
For at forblive konkurrencedygtige skal virksomheder reagere hurtigt på markedsdynamikken, og QualiWare’s produkter og service tilbyder en innovativ tilgang til markedsdynamik og forandring. 
QualiWare sikrer, at kunderne har de rigtige værktøjer til vellykkede og proaktive forretningstransformationer og forandringsledelse, således at hele organisationen er forenet og strategisk samarbejder om et fælles sæt af mål.

h1092434.title: Camera/Vision Hardware Engineer
h1092434.text:
Do you have a passion for Vision, Optics and Light sources and wish to combine this with cutting edge sport tracking product in a market-leading Company? 
Then, we can offer you an exciting opportunity in our very skilled hardware team. At Trackman we are growing, as we are constantly striving to further develop, produce and deploy our market leading sport tracking solutions. These new products are based on multi sensor technology such and radar and vision. 
You will work closely with our in-house R&D digital hardware designers, and our vison computer modelling engineers that develops the tracking algorithms. You will have the opportunity to engage with various technologies such as sensors for radar and vision data, interfaces such as LVDS, Ethernet & USB, various internal interfaces, and sensors such as hall sensors and inclinometers.

h1092203.title: Senior CRM Developer – join a team where collaboration is in focus
h1092203.text:
Becoming part of this team is a great opportunity to work in an agile setup, as part of an empowered and cross-functional team. Our two CRM Squads are international (10 nationalities and counting!) and English is the primary language. 
We value diversity and inclusivity, team-work, proactivity and creativity. 
As a CRM Developer your mission will be to:

h1092194.title: Vi søger erfaren testmanager til Forskudsopgørelsen
h1092194.text:
Vil du være en del af teamet bag en helt central samfundsopgave - at levere Forskudsopgørelsen til 5 mio. skatteydere i Danmark? Du bliver en del af kontoret Personsystemer i Udviklings- og Forenklingsstyrelsen, som har det it-mæssige ansvar for Årsopgørelsen og Forskudsopgørelsen, som hvert år skal sikre borgerne korrekt skatteberegning af over 500 mia. kr. 
 Vi opmander i testteamet med engagerede og erfarne medarbejdere, som er ansvarlige for at Personsystemer, lever op til vores organisatoriske testpolitik, -strategi og -proces, samt ambition om høj automatisering. Det faglige er i højsæde, og omgangstonen er uformel og imødekommende. 
Du bliver ansvarlig testmanager for Forskudsopgørelsen og skal indgå i et tæt samarbejde med forretningen, ledelsen og leverandører. Du supplerer teamet med yderligere erfaring i styring af testprojekter og samarbejde med leverandører.

h1091648.title: Senior Electronics Engineer
h1091648.company: Venaris Executive Search recruiting on behalf of NKT Photonics A/S in Birkerød
h1091648.text:
This is an extraordinary opportunity if you have the ambition and potential to take ownership of electrical design for state-of-the art laser products in an organization that embarks on significant growth paths globally. 
 As the new Senior Electronics Engineer, you will be part of the global multidisciplinary team developing state-of-the-art systems and accessory devices. Working closely in cross-functional teams, you will be responsible for the electronic development of laser products throughout the entire product lifecycle. 
As such, you will have a deciding role in ensuring that NKT Photonics stays at the cutting edge of their industry by helping customers develop the next generation of innovative solutions. A part of this role will also be to ensure product compliance and certification according to industry standards.

h1091173.title: Product Manager – Ethernet Switching & TSN
h1091173.text:
For our growing business we are looking for a talented and dedicated Product Manager to our headquarter in Kongens Lyngby, Denmark, who will take a leading position in the definition and development of our advanced Ethernet products. 
You will play a key role in defining architecture for our Ethernet switching solutions for TSN and make sure that it all adds up to solutions with the right market attractiveness. 
Through your contribution you have the opportunity to influence on how coming key technologies globally will unfold and you will work with key players enabling this. 
We offer a versatile and challenging job opportunity in an international work environment.

h1090974.title: Software Developer
h1090974.text:
Imagine a future - where internet connectivity knows no boundaries. Do you want to join one of the leading manufacturers of communication and satellite equipment on a fantastic transformational journey?
 We have an open position as a Software Developer within our software department for antennas and terminals. Here we bring life to the motor controlled satellite antennas and network connected terminals. 
 We think you currently work and have special interest in the following areas:

h1069541.title: PLC-programmører/projektledere indenfor procesautomatisering
h1069541.company: Human Skills søger for Au2mate A/S i Silkeborg, Odense og Hillerød
h1069541.text:
Du bliver en del af vores dygtige team af projektledere og softwareudviklere og vil få ansvar for design/udvikling af PLC-løsninger og afvikling af automatiseringsprojekter. 
 Du vil blive involveret i hele projektforløbet fra første kundekontakt til overdragelse af den endelige løsning til kunden. Au2mate har kunder og opgaver i hele verden. Du kan derfor forvente at opstart og idriftsættelse af de udviklede løsninger vil foregå både i ind- og udland. 
 Au2mate A/S tilbyder et spændende og udfordrende job i en international virksomhed i vækst med et meget højt fagligt niveau og attraktive fremtidsmuligheder.

h1089288.title: Business Process Specialist
h1089288.company: GML-HR A/S recruiting on behalf of VELUX in Kolding or Hørsholm
h1089288.text:
Do you thrive on closing gaps and optimising business processes? And do you want to put your SAP knowledge into play as you ensure our SAP Logistics platform and integrations are optimised, and increase customer perceived value through developing our logistics solutions for offline and online? Then we might be looking for you! 
We offer you a chance to join our logistics team where you will be one of our subject matter experts within SAP integration and commercial logistics - and if you have the ambitions and skills, you will be given ample opportunity to initiate and carry out your own optimisation projects. Also, you will work closely with the E-COM and omni-channel team.

h1101568.title: Platform/System engineer
h1101568.text:
We are looking for a platform/system engineer ready to share and grow You will become part of Team Backend in the domain Data & Cloud. Data & Cloud are responsible of building and maintaining the BI & Analytics Datawarehouse and tool stack.
 In this position you will join a team of 7 people, consisting of developers, and product owner working together to ensure stabile, secure, and well performing PowerCenter platform. The platform has more than 60.000 jobs executing every day. 
 As a platform/system engineer, we will need you to drive important tasks and solve incoming incidents for all different kinds of users. You will work closely with team members, product owners, development managers and architects.

h1100701.title: Softwareudvikler
h1100701.text:
Har du lyst til at blive en del af et kompetent udviklerteam i en af Danmarks største banker og udvikle software af høj kvalitet med fokus på automatisering? Brænder du for at arbejde agilt med fokus på løbende værdiskabelse? 
 I Sydbank arbejder vi med forretningskritiske systemer og applikationer. Området er i en spændende udvikling og vi er bl.a. ved at lave en ny produktorganisering med fokus på et Agilt/DevOps mind-set og vi har for kort tid siden købt af Alm. Brand Bank. Vi udvider vores team og søger derfor en dygtig softwareudvikler med stærke kompetencer indenfor .Net/C#. 
Du bliver en del af vores Apps og Services team, der arbejder på løsninger på tværs af Sydbank. Teamet ligger i vores softwareudviklingsafdeling, hvor vi er 25 kompetente kolleger, som er en del af IT-området der tæller ca. 130 medarbejdere.

h1100605.title: IT-systemarkitekt til udvikling af fremtidens digitaliserede forsvar
h1100605.text:
Er du en erfaren og nysgerrig it-systemarkitekt, og brænder du for at udvikle dit speciale og dygtiggøre dig indenfor dit fag? Og kan du løfte IT-infrastrukturen, og sikre konsolidering af Forsvarets it for soldater i ind- og udland? Så er det dig, vi leder efter!
Stillingen har ingen fast geografisk placering, da vi har lokationer i hele landet. Det er derfor op til dig, hvor dit tjenestested skal være. 
Stillingen indeholder en bred vifte af opgaver relateret til infrastruktur og netværksarkitektur, løsningsorienteret arkitektur samt kommunikativt og strategisk IT-arkitektur.

h1100367.title: Cloud security BISO
h1100367.text:
Ready to be professionally ambitious together with others? We are proud of what we do, and we share the ambition to create tech solutions that are vital for Denmark’s financial infrastructure. At BEC you will be part of a transformation of our organization and tech solutions.
 In the position as cloud security BISO, you will work closely with Cloud Center of Excellence (CCoE team members, customers and our Security and Compliance department. Your primary tasks and responsibilities will include:

h1100296.title: Regnskabsmedarbejder med digitale kompetencer
h1100296.text:
I PwC One Business Center søger vi en kollega til vores regnskabsteam. Dine primære opgaver vil bestå af at opstille regnskaber både i CaseWare samt i vores nye rapporteringsplatform Silverfin. 
 Hos PwC One Business Center arbejder vi standardiseret med digitale værktøjer. For at komme i betragtning til jobbet, skal du trives med digitalisering, og synes, at det er sjovt at være med til både at udvikle digitale værktøjer, samt at sikre best practice i brugen af digitale værktøjer på tværs af organisationen. 
 Dine arbejdsopgaver vil særligt bestå af:

h1073941.title: Software Developer
h1073941.text:
DAMM Cellular Systems A/S is a world leader in the provision of scalable, innovative, user-friendly and cost-efficient TETRA and DMR infrastructure products to industrial, commercial and public safety customers. 
We are looking for a software developer to join our R&D Software Development Team. 
You will be responsible for the following areas:

h1073934.title: Test/Hardware Software Developer
h1073934.text:
We are looking for an experienced test engineer to take us further in the field of development and maintenance of test fixtures for both hardware and software. 
The main task will be to develop tools and systems for testing in R&D and Production. Your job responsibilities will include:

h1073927.title: Radio Communication Developer
h1073927.text:
DAMM Cellular Systems A/S is a world leader in the provision of scalable, innovative, user-friendly and cost-efficient TETRA and DMR infrastructure products to industrial, commercial and public safety customers. 
We are looking for a development engineer with experience in design and development of RF circuits and units with special knowledge and experience of digital linearization technologies and whose primary task will be to develop part of our radio communication. 
As radio communication developer at DAMM your further responsibilities will include:

h1099063.title: Porteføljemanager til Koncern IT
h1099063.text:
Kan du have mange bolde i luften og har du solid erfaring med porteføljestyring eller projektledelse? Har du samtidig gennemslagskraft og er god til at fremlægge? Så er du måske vores nye kollega. 
 Koncern IT understøtter Region Sjællands virksomhedsområder og tværgående centre. Vi indsamler årligt ønsker om nye projekter og har en aktiv portefølje på ca. 100 projekter. Vi søger dig, som brænder for porteføljestyring planlægning og kapacitetsstyring og som er skarp til at analysere dig frem til de nødvendige resultater.

h1097730.title: Vi leder efter dig, der kan være vores næste Senior Konsulent til Microsoft Business Central (tidligere Navision) i Roskilde
h1097730.text:
Er du den bedste til kunderne, superskarp til alting og kan klare alting selv? Så er det IKKE dig vi leder efter! Men kan du arbejde metodisk i et samarbejde i et team om opgaverne, så kan det måske være lige netop dig vi leder efter? 
 Vores drømmekonsulent:

h1097517.title: Applikationsspecialist til Koncern IT
h1097517.text:
Vi søger en applikationsspecialist med evnen og gåpåmodet til at gøre en forskel og sikre videreudvikling af applikationerne inden for området. 
Du vil primært arbejde med at videreudvikle og vedligeholde vores eksisterende løsninger inden for Digital Post, samtidig med at du er med til at sikre forankring af MitID. 
Det er vigtigt, at du kan navigere i et komplekst setup med mange forskellige aktører og komponenter. 
Vi forventer, at du har en relevant IT-faglig baggrund enten via uddannelse eller erfaring. Du kan tilegne dig teknisk viden om de enkelte applikationer/software, og du er god til at bevare overblikket.

h1097069.title: Arkitekt til IT-netværk - Udvikle og vedligeholde netværksservices
h1097069.company: Peak Rekruttering søger for JN Data i Silkeborg eller Roskilde
h1097069.text:
Er du drevet af netværksarkitektur? Ønsker du en central rolle i de netværksservices, JN Data tilbyder sine kunder? Så er her en enestående mulighed for at blive en del af et yderst kompetent team, der til stadighed skal levere tidssvarende og stabile løsninger i et miljø, hvor sikkerhed og compliance er ekstremt vigtige parametre i hverdagen. 
 Som Service Arkitekt har du ansvaret for at udvikle, beskrive og vedligeholde de services, JN Data tilbyder til deres kunder. 
Dine nærmeste samarbejdspartnere er virksomhedens serviceejere, din kollega Service Arkitekt på netværk, produktejere, Technical Leads, Løsningsarkitekter samt alle de teknikere, der i dagligdagen arbejder i projekter og med driften af vores netværk.

h1096941.title: Technical Solutions Manager (TSM) – Scandinavia
h1096941.text:
At Fleet Complete we are invested in your success. We want you to have a job you are genuinely excited about, as well as opportunities to learn, grow and challenge yourself. If you are passionate about your career and are eager to be a key contributor to the company’s success, then this role is for you. 
 Essential duties & responsibilities: 
 The position is focused on supporting the Scandinavian team; the ideal candidate will be situated in Scandinavia, however strong applicants with previous telematics experience will be considered in regions outside of the preferred location.

h1081505.title: Web Developer
h1081505.company: Academic Work recruiting on behalf of Vinoteket.com ApS in Køge
h1081505.text:
Are you into e-commerce web development? Do you like full stack, building stuff from the ground up? Vinoteket is a fast growing e-commerce player in the Nordics ,they don't like overcomplicating things, they like focusing on what's important, they like e-commerce. Join the journey at Vinoteket and apply today! 
 Vinoteket is currently looking for a web developer to their new Danish team. Vinoteket has seen great success in the Nordics and in many ways is operating with a start-up culture where the IT department is the central driver for business innovation. Internally the IT department is characterized by a very high degree of flexibility using agile methods and sprints. 
 We are looking for someone who:
 Read more about the position here

h1073224.title: Cyber security consultant
h1073224.text:
You are offered an attractive job in a dynamic organization. The tone is informal, and you will work among professionals and quality-conscious colleagues in a team that needs your specific professional skills.
As a cyber security consultant in BEC, you have the responsibility for ensuring that the sufficient and effective level of cyber security is assessed across projects and systems together with the Cyber Security team in BEC. 
 The cyber security consultant should be able to understand the different sets of security requirements, compliance standards and threat landscapes, and be able to apply these in the constructive dialogue with projects and product owners. You should have a “Can do attitude” enabling business to excel with the support and advise on IT-security and cyber.

h1084666.title: Domain architect
h1084666.text:
Are you eager to be a part of something bigger? Ready to be professionally ambitious together with others? Then we might have the right opportunity for you. 
 In the position as domain architect, you will work closely with development directors, customer/product managers, enterprise architects, development managers/development teams, data stewards, and other domain architects- providers of key supporting services and architectural building blocks. E.g. DevOps, API. 
 Your primary tasks and responsibilities will include:

h1094621.title: Senior BI Developer – er det dig?
h1094621.text:
Vil du gå i spidsen på rejsen mod fremtidens digitale Danmark? Og har du drive og erfaring, der gør dig til en nøgleperson, når vi gør Fibia til Danmarks bedste fiberselskab? – Så er denne stilling måske noget for dig. 
 Dine primære opgaver: 
 Vi tilbyder dig et job i en travl og målrettet virksomhed med kollegaer, der er passionerede og initiativrige, samt en god løn svarende til kvalifikationer.

h1094354.title: IT-projektleder
h1094354.company: Randstad A/S søger for IT Relation
h1094354.text:
Til en nyoprettet stilling hos IT Relation søges en IT-projektleder, som vil få ansvaret for at holde styr på de spændende projekter, der lander i afdelingen. I Microsoft Solutions er vi specialiseret i Office 365-løsninger, herunder BI, CRM, SharePoint, Teams osv. Løsninger, der alle understøtter og effektiviserer kundernes forskellige processer. 
 Du vil som projektleder få ansvaret for at drive og styre både store og mindre projekter, og du kommer til at spille en meget central rolle ift. at sikre, at der leveres den værdi, kunden ønsker – til tiden. Sammen med projektteamet skal du sørge for, at I kommer godt fra start og sikkert i mål på en effektiv måde med de leverancer, der er lovet.

h1094351.title: Modern workplace employer experience office 365 konsulent
h1094351.company: Randstad A/S søger for IT Relation
h1094351.text:
Til en nyoprettet stilling hos IT Relation søges en Modern Workplace/Employer Experience (O365) konsulent, som vil blive udførende på diverse Office 365-projekter – helt fra workshops med kunderne til opsætning af løsningen til den afsluttende overdragelse. Det er derfor væsentligt, at du har en rigtig god forretningsforståelse og kan sparre med kunderne omkring optimering af deres forskellige processer, således at vores løsninger skaber den rette værdi for kunden. 
 Du vil have en hverdag præget af en tæt dialog med både kunder og kolleger i forhold til at levere værdi til kunden, sikre intern sparring og en fornuftig fordeling af opgaver. Opgaverne spænder fra deltagelse i salg til gennemførelse af projekter hos kunden. Du bliver en succes i jobbet, hvis du har en agil tilgang til projekter og kan sætte dig ind i kundernes forretningsprocesser.

h1092819.title: Product owner for Advisory Tools
h1092819.text:
Can you ensure the right prioritization of tasks and assignments to the team members to fulfill the requirements of the stakeholders? And do you feel at ease in different setups with your different stakeholders, so you can create a constructive environment for your dialogue?
 As a product owner in BEC, you have the responsibility for ensuring that both stakeholders and the team are certain about the goal for the product. The product owner should be able to understand the different needs of our customers and apply this into solutions resulting in our customers acknowledgement of the releases as value-adding deliveries. You will be working closely together with the development manager, the scrum master, and other agile roles in the Domain, as well as the product manager with whom you will be a part of a product management team.

h1101677.title: iOS udviklere
h1101677.company: Bloom søger for ForeFlight i Odense
h1101677.text:
Vil du arbejde med de dygtigste iOS udviklere i verden? ForeFlight, a Boing Company, vil skabe et nyt dansk iOS team i Odense.
 For vores kunde ForeFlight søger vi de dygtigste og mest talentfulde iOS udviklere. Du får her tilbudt en enestående mulighed for at udvikle dig og lære af eliten. Er du en af de iOS udviklere, som konstant ønsker at flytte grænser for, hvad der er muligt indenfor iOS området - så er det dig, vi søger. 
 ForeFlight har udviklet den bedst sælgende iPhone og iPad app til private- og professionelle piloter samt operatører indenfor luftfart. Deres software bruges til planlægning af flyvninger og nyder stor anerkendelse verden over.
